question: What is the maximum home loan I can get with an annual income of $75,000 and no existing debts?
true_answer: With an annual income of $75,000 and no existing debts, you may qualify for a maximum loan amount of approximately $375,000, assuming a standard front-end DTI of 28% and back-end DTI of 36%.
